fulltext:
Ly Nguyen 
SENIOR BUSINESS DEVELOPER 
Hanoi born and based since 1990. 
5 years experience in B2B sales. 
PERSONAL PROFILE 
I am dynamic, ambitious and 
flexible person, experienced in 
Marketing and Business 
Development with a great 
capacity to adapt to different 
working environment. 
SKILLS AND 
EXPERTISE 
Strong Sales 
Negotiation Skills 
Excellent Communication Skill 
Account Management 
Data Analysis Skils 
Digital Marketing 
Fast Learner 
Team-work spirit 
CONTACT ME AT: 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
ACCOUNT MANAGER 
Appota Corp | May 2016 - Sep 2019 
Find new customers and Develop a strong working 
relationship with them. 
Drive clients’ mobile traffic performance and Optimize 
publisher’s revenue. 
MARKETING EXCUTIVE 
Dai Viet Group | Mar 2015 - Apr 2016 
Make and execute marketing plans for Company's 
product. 
Analyze user data from Fan Page & Website. 
FRANCHISE CONSULTANT 
BBQ Vietnam | May 2013 - Feb 2015 
Consult business model and convince customer to 
buy franchises. 
Customer support after sale. 
EDUCATION 
ACADEMY OF FINANCE 
Accounting and Finance / Bachelor of 
Degree 
ARCHIVEMENT 
KPI achievement in 3 quarters continuous. 
Best revenue team of Google Channel Partners in 
South East Asia.
